definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: tremble, quake (Aram. (incl. BAram.) id., zo9; cf. also Ar. ja09 impel, za9za9a move, agitate, shake (on these v. Nö:ZMG 1886, 725), As. zû, storm-wind (= Aram. [[זוֹעָא]]) Zim BP 94—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: (late) Pf. 3 ms. [[זׇע]] Es 5:9; Impf. 3 mpl. c. rel. [[שֶׁיׇּזֻעזּ]] Ec 12:3; —tremble, quake, in presence of powerful superior Es 5:9 (sq. [[מִמֶּנּוּ]]); said of [[שׁׂמְרֵי הַבַּיִת]] in descr. of infirm old man Ec 12:3

definitions.title: Pilp.
definitions.body: Pt. sf. [[מְזַזְעֶיךָ]] Hb Hab 2:7; causat. and intens. they that shall violently shake thee, fig. of foes of Babylon, instruments of Yahweh's judgment.
